website_summaries.verdict: 2-item kit consisting of a cleanser and treatment cream, contains many natural ingredients along with benzoyl peroxide and salicylic acid.
pros: Users overwhelmingly praise this kit for giving great results on minor, moderate, and also severe acne (there are 2 strengths of the kit available)
There is also a 100-day "hassle free," 100% refund guarantee, so buyers can give the products a solid chance to work
cons: A few people claim this product didn't help their acne, with a small number having a bad reaction to the formulation, such as dry skin or rash

customer_reviews.title: Almost empty bottles!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed with this product, first of all the bottles are really empty!!! I contacted the company to see if maybe there was a mistake, I even sent them this pictures, but they said that's the way there are, they said "half full" but as you can see in my pictures that's not even half full!!! And second it has a strong nasty smell! So, I will never buy this stuff again. I'm very disappointed with the product and with their response of "half full"
customer_reviews.author: Denia

customer_reviews.title: smacne
customer_reviews.text: I experienced a horrible breakout after camping, and was desperate to try anything when i saw a hilarious video that caught my attention. I searched to the product and of course amazon has everything! I only received the product a few days ago, but in the few days i have used it, the swelling has gone down significantly and feels SO much better. It made the area super dry and peel around the areas, but working from home at the moment, i dont mind as long as it gets rid of it! I cant wait to keep using the product to see what kind of results it gives me in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I received my first order of smacne kit almost 2 weeks ago. I didn’t want to write a review till I gave it time to see how my skin reacted. I am in my 30’s and a mom of 2 and have been dealing with adult acne for a while now. During these hard times of what’s happening all around us the stress caused my skin to also react more than before. I came across your kit on Facebook and thought why not give it a try! It works wonders! I have not found anything that worked for my skin till now! I’ll definitely be ordering again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Ribeka Ellivera

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. My adult acne was getting out of control, so I bought this after trying a few other things. My skin was 40% clear after only a week. I usually have a gnarly breakout right before my period but this stuff stopped it cold. I am really impressed. I generally don’t write a lot of reviews but this product really deserves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time acne sufferer who still gets pimples as an adult. Of course, it's not the same amount or type as when I was a teenager, but pimples are never welcome. I decided to try this after the reviews on Amazon and I'm happy I did. The stuff is gentle and reduces pimples in no time. I'd definitely recommend trying this.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: It is very frustrating to get acne as an adult. I was so grateful that this solution worked for me that I decided to write up a review, which is not something I usually do. This SMACNE Acne Treatment Cream and Cleanser Kit completely got rid of all my pimples. I can’t even remember my skin being so clean and clear. The cleanser is very gentle while the treatment cream is powerful and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Ardell Slay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely be buying this product again. I’ve suffered from bad acne for a long time and tried so many different things but nothing seemed to help. I finally gave this a try and within a week my skin was looking so much better. I’m glad I gave it a try and will definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product for acne!
customer_reviews.text: SMACNE worked overnight for me. I was very happy with the way it helped my acne go away, and it smells good too. I was nervous that it would dry out my skin like similar products do, however SMACNE did not. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Varda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I tried this great product because it really does work. It cleared my adult acne in weeks. My breakouts have been getting smaller day after day. I was struggling with acne worse than I ever did when I was a teenager and this cleared it all. I highly recommend you give this a shot.
customer_reviews.author: William Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I heard good things about this product. Ordered it. The smell was absolutely terrible but wanted to see if it would help my very mild acne. Did nothing. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yande Musonda

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a try after several failed attempts at reducing my adult acne. I’m happy to report that after a few weeks of consistent, regular use, my acne is now significantly reduced. It has been very effective at drying out acne breakouts and has left my skin feeling refreshed and healthy on a daily basis. I highly recommend it to anyone with mild to severe adult acne. Trust me, it will change your life for the better!
customer_reviews.author: sonnhild thomasine

customer_reviews.title: Most effective skin treatment
customer_reviews.text: I finally found something that works for my face! I have extremely oily skin and stubborn, persistent acne has plagued my face for years. I’ve tried countless treatments to no avail, until I stumbled upon this treatment cream and cleanser kit. I have used it for about a week now and I’m happy to say that I’m already seeing excellent results. My skin is clearer and the acne has started to reduce.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Prado

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The acne cream you get at the drug store - like clean & clear - works better than this. This dries my skin itchy AMD does not do anythj f to reduce the acne! Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Works so well!!
customer_reviews.text: It has been exactly one month since I started using smacne and I love it so much! I have struggled for years to find something that actually fixes and prevents my adult acne without a million skin-irritating steps. Smacne even staved off my hormonal acne, and is fading old acne scars!! I have super sensitive skin, so I had to use smacne just once a day instead of twice, but it still worked wonderfully. I love being able to be confident in my skin again, and to leave the house bare-faced and glowing. I also love supporting a small business. Thank you thank you thank you. I'm now recommending smacne to all of my students struggling with their skin.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Best product for acne!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when I first recieved this product in the mail, but IT WORKS! Unlike most individuals, I started dealing with acne later in life (sometime in my 20s) due to my PCOS. Having never dealt with acne before this was super frustrating and embarrassing. Thank you SMACNE, you have nearly cleared my entire face!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with adult hormonal acne for over a year now and nothing has helped. I've spent so much money trying all kinds of stuff. I figured with the free trial I didn't have anything to lose and I'm SO glad I tried Smacne. The really big bad cysts have cleared up and I haven't gotten them anymore and the little comedone pimples have smoothed out and everything just feels great. I will continue to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Tropf

customer_reviews.title: Best Results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for over a month now and I have definitely seen positive results. I tend to get hormonal breakouts and sometimes the acne is stubborn about going away, but smacne has kept my breakouts at a bare minimum during my worst time of the month and otherwise keeps my skin feeling fresh and clean. I also tend to get irritated dry skin, especially in the winter months, but the aloe has been working to soothe any irritation while the acne cleanser does its job. I have tried a few different acne creams and medications and this product has provided me with the best results so far. I definitely will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Katie W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this acne system!
customer_reviews.text: I started getting cystic acne along my jawline and chin area within the last few months. I was using Murad since 2011 but it wasn’t working anymore so I took the plunge and found this system. I did not go through a purge period, instead my cystic acne started healing right away. I did dry out a bit but made sure to continue with product and now my skin is balanced and pimple free. I’m not saying that I do not get a little pimple or two, but the bigger cystic acne is completely gone!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Best acne solution
customer_reviews.text: I saw amazing results just a month after I’ve started using this treatment kit. It’s a highly effective solution to remove pimples and prevent further breakouts. It also feels good and soothing to use the cleanser on my face twice a day. I feel clean and refreshed and pimple free!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect treatment for adult acne. It’s a simple two-step process that doesn’t take long to integrate in your daily grooming routine and that will effectively take care of your pimples while preventing new pimples from appearing. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ray

customer_reviews.title: Could help
customer_reviews.text: A little high of a price for such a small amount of product. I purchased just over three months ago and it worked fine for a couple of weeks, but then I started breaking out again. This product wasn’t meant for me but maybe it will help you.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I just turned 40, but unfortunately, I still get breakouts from time to time. I have tried many different products, but it didn't always work for me. This starter kit caught my eye because it seemed simpler and less-time consuming to use. Well, it's only been a few days, but the pimples near my chin have cleared after two-three days. That's pretty fast!
customer_reviews.author: Alina M Kim

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it!!

customer_reviews.text: This product gave me hope to finally have a flawless skin. I’ve been using it for a few weeks now and my pimples have completely dried out and disappeared. My skin looks fresh and clean and did not cause any reddening on my skin. This is the best acne removal product I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than anything!
customer_reviews.text: I have had acne my entire life. I've been on every conceivable oral and topical medication form minocycline to accutane and nothing has worked for me like SMACNE. I made the mistake of trying something else once it had cleared up my skin, and I broke out again. So now I'm back, and will never use anything else. It has made my skin clear and calm. I've recommended it to everyone!

I would recommend this product to anyone!!

customer_reviews.author: kasey gossett

customer_reviews.title: I am LOVING SMACNE !
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought SMACNE to try out for my daughter but then started getting breakouts myself and this stuff is amazing!! Even though I haven't been using it long, I can tell a major difference in my skin! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Curt Garrett

customer_reviews.title: That it does clear pimples and it works
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product it really works the only thing I did not like it’s that the tube it’s to small for the price I order two of them and I’m happy I did
customer_reviews.author: Heidiestrada

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: So this cream works pretty good on my acne but it stinks! I mean it really stinks to the point I kinda don’t want it on my face. But it is helping a lot so I can deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica hall

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 14 and super hormonal. We have tried everything from Proactive to Curology. SMACNE has cleared up her face so much and she’s all smiles again!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Foster

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many different products for acne and this was the only one that worked! It gets rid of all of the pesky pimples that won't away. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Saved my skin
customer_reviews.text: This product I have been using for over a year now and I cannot live without it. I had horrible acne, redness, and texture and this is what saved my skin. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cuellar

customer_reviews.title: No more maskne
customer_reviews.text: I am a healthcare worker and since the pandemic I got a serious case of maskne. This is the only product that helped clear up my skin. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great acne product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, already finished one kit and now on second but seeing very positive and visible results. Highly recommend for people suffering from acne for a long long time
customer_reviews.author: Rahein

customer_reviews.title: Fast working
customer_reviews.text: This great product works fast and is gentle to the skin. I only use it once a day because I have very sensitive skin. Even so, it has efficiently prevented pimples from breaking out. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a quick and easy treatment for acne prone skin. The cleanser deep cleans your pores and will efficiently prevent further breakouts while the spot treatment is very quick acting at reducing existing pimples.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha B

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son has severe acne and this works best for him. It took a couple of weeks to start working but sticking to the daily routine has made a huge difference. His face is almost clear since he’s started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product! My daughter has tried a few products and this by far has worked the best. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great combo for acne
customer_reviews.text: Smacne smells great, removes my makeup and clearing up my acne with out drying out my skin
customer_reviews.author: El Sayed

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this acne treatment. It has not caused any dryness or irritation on my skin yet has been so efficient at clearing up my stubborn acne. I’ll definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Leibole

customer_reviews.title: Effective and good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s effective and would continue using it. It heals my active acne faster.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Best product for acne
customer_reviews.text: Very good product leaves skin very soft and cleans face within about a week, i really recommend it worth the money
customer_reviews.author: fernando dominguez

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very sensitive and this product is really amazing help me a lot with my acne I recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe alarcon maxinez

product_meta.title: SMACNE Severe Treatment Cream for Cystic Acne, Severe Acne, and Acne Spot Treatment with Benzoyl Peroxide (10%), Tea Tree Oil, and Glycolic Acid - 1oz.
feature_bullets: OUR MOST POWERFUL ACNE TREATMENT YET. Whether you have severe or cystic acne, or you just have a spot or two to take care of, SMACNE Severe Treatment Cream’s intensive formula is the one treatment you need to quickly and effectively eliminate acne.

10% BENZOYL PEROXIDE. SMACNE Severe Treatment Cream contains the highest concentration of benzoyl peroxide, a powerful anti-bacterial agent that kills acne-causing bacteria on your skin — penetrating deep within your pores to remove excess sebum and other impurities — to treat and prevent breakouts!

GLYCOLIC ACID and TEA TREE OIL. This combination removes dead skin cells that can cause acne scars, and nourishes your skin to stimulate your skin’s natural healing process. Together with benzoyl peroxide, glycolic acid and tea tree oil make SMACNE Severe Treatment Cream our most powerful acne treatment yet.
TREATS AND PREVENTS SEVERE AND CYSTIC ACNE. SMACNE Severe Treatment Cream gives you clear skin and helps keep it that way, because it doesn’t stop at treating acne — it keeps it from coming back!
CLEAR SKIN. SMACNE Severe Treatment Cream smacks acne from all sides — so you get clear skin and nothing but!
